snippet: The state media says the people who delivered deadly cyanide — evidently in error — to a main water treatment plant will face charges of the attempted murder “of the people of Harare.”
lead_paragraph: The state media says the people who delivered deadly cyanide — evidently in error — to a main water treatment plant will face charges of the attempted murder “of the people of Harare.”

headline.seo: Zimbabwe: Cyanide Disaster Averted, Newspaper Says
